title: ITS SO HARD TO FIX BAN PICK CRASH PROBLEM ?
body: I  got this problem thousand times ï¼Œ and some time shop crash , but feel so suck in ban pick crash its mean i need to waiting 5 mins and lost lp ,gggg  can riot fix that ??????????

replies.body:
when u play 1500 rank game u will know that problem, bro .
150 rank game is nothing ,I have friend got same problem, so why i come here ask for help btw thanks for ur anwser.

I've played 150 ranked games and never had this happen.

Could it be your PC/Drivers are actually the issue and instead of doing a clean install and all that crap they suggest you do you're just aimlessly posting on a forum out of frustration?

Good Luck with your issue.
